FuncDef:
The ftp ipv6 server timeout command sets the idle timeout interval of the client.
The undo ftp ipv6 server timeout command restores the idle timeout interval to its default value. The ftp ipv6 server timeout command sets the idle timeout interval of the client. The undo ftp ipv6 server timeout command restores the idle timeout interval to its default value. By default, the timeout value is 10 minutes.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the timeout interval in minutes.
Timeout interval is an integer data type. The value range is from 1 to 35791 minutes.
